With Squaretalk chrome extension, Dial and call phone numbers from any CRM,  Webpage or Excel google Sheets.
With this chrome extension,  Squaretalk Axiom features are available to help you connect with customers better and faster.
Use this extension to convert phone numbers into clickable links that allow quick dialing from your favorite CRM, support desk applications or any web page using Squaretalk Axiom Contact Center.
Using Squaretalk extension with Pop Up feature enabled will automatically launch a pop up on your screen with the contact information from your CRM or helpdesk.  The Popup feature without any integration can allow you to lookup the phone number within your CRM template. The Contact URL returned by the template is passed on to the Web Client, which will automatically launch the URL generated.
- Save time and effort by reducing manual work and enabling seamless dialing.
- Dial and call phone numbers from any webpage.
- Select which local or international numbers to validate or detect from any webpage, such as a prospectâ€™s website, Google Sheets, and more.
-  Automatically scan web pages when you want to find phone numbers.
With Axiom Squaretalk Call Center Streamline your workflow with advanced call functionality like call recording, mute, on hold, transfers and conferencing.
The chrome extension identifies all phone numbers in the e.164 format + local.
NOTE:
To learn more about Squaretalk Contact Center go to https://squaretalk.com
